tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-demo-entry
tags.description:
gannett-atoms-component-demo-entry is used as a wrapper for individual demo entries.
The actual element demo should be slotted into this component.

attributes.label: description
attributes.description: Description for the current demo entry

tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-demo-head
tags.description:
gannett-atoms-component-demo-head is an internal component used to populate the <head> of the
demo.html & index.html, mainly to add styling to the overall page.

attributes.label: text
attributes.description: Passes an attribute to the component and sets a default value if not present

tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-demo-links
tags.description: gannett-atoms-component-demo-links builds demo links for the index page.

tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-demo-wrapper
tags.description: gannett-atoms-component-demo-wrapper is a body wrapper for the demo page.

attributes.label: comp-name
attributes.description: The demo name for the component header.

attributes.label: is-index
attributes.description: Flag for the index page to disable sub header.

attributes.label: bg-color
attributes.description: Background color for the button.

attributes.label: target
attributes.description: Target for opening the URL.

attributes.label: text-color
attributes.description: Text color for the button.

attributes.label: url
attributes.description: The button href value

tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-ui-icon
tags.description: gannett-atoms-component-ui-icon is a component that does so-and-so

attributes.label: clickable
attributes.description:
If true, uses a pointer when hovering and emits the "icon-clicked" event.
To detect the event in a parent component:

attributes.label: icon
attributes.description: The icon name to be used

attributes.label: size
attributes.description: The size (height & width) of the icon.

tags.label: gannett-atoms-component-ui-input
tags.description: gannett-atoms-component-ui-input-text is a component that does so-and-so

attributes.label: error-message
attributes.description: The error message to be displayed if input is invalid.

attributes.label: focused
attributes.description: Handles whether or not the input element is focused.

attributes.label: input-value
attributes.description: Value of the input

attributes.label: invalid
attributes.description:
Manual flag to set invalid state, used for styling.
Should occur by consuming component if submission is attempted while input is empty.

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: The placeholder label.

attributes.label: name
attributes.description: The name attribute of the input element.

attributes.label: progress
attributes.description:
Manual flag to set progress bar state, used for styling.
Should occur by consuming component on submit & removed after submission has completed.

attributes.label: type
attributes.description: The type of input. "text" & "email" are valid types.

attributes.label: valid
attributes.description:
Determines if the form input, regardless of current input styling, is valid.
Used by consuming components on form submission.
